alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:08PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Oneida County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1008 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bridgeport, or 10 miles southwest of Camden, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rome, Lee, Verona, Vienna, Camden, Sylvan Beach, Blossvale, New London, Verona Beach and Taberg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
